short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables a better user experience while using doDOC.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension the user will have his doDOC experience improved. It will be possible to use the application menus (Right Click and Toolbar) to paste contents into doDOC application and allows access to the installed font lists.
